Address.label: Address
Address.value: 109 EAST DIVISION STREET, SPARTA, Michigan, 49345, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: ChoiceOne Financial Services Inc is a full-service banking institution. It is engaged in the business of providing personal and business banking solutions, borrowing solutions, and treasury services. The bank's product and services portfolio consist of time, savings and demand deposits, safe deposit services, automated transaction machine services, commercial and consumer loans, commercial lending to business, industry, agricultural, construction, inventory, and real estate categories. Its primary market area is Kent, Muskegon, Newaygo, and Ottawa counties in Michigan.

value.name: Shelly M. Childers
value.title: Chief Information Officer & Senior Vice President
